description.ko: 고대 성간 먼지와 우주의 깊은 정적이 만나는 VOID-3 구역의 무한한 어둠 속으로의 하강.
description.en: A descent into the infinite darkness of the VOID-3 sector, where ancient stardust meets the crushing silence of the cosmic deep.

prompt: cinematic shot of an infinite cosmic abyss, VOID-3 theme, dark navy and obsidian color palette, ethereal nebulae glowing faintly in the distance, cosmic dust particles floating in zero gravity, hyper-realistic, 8k, volumetric lighting, silent void atmosphere, deep space exploration aesthetic
